dataset=pd.read_csv("../input/titanic/train.csv")
test=pd.read_csv("../input/titanic/test.csv")
dataset=dataset.dropna()
test=test.dropna()

dataset = dataset.replace({'female': 1, 'male': 2})
dataset["Cabin"] = dataset["Cabin"].astype('category').cat.codes
dataset["Embarked"] = dataset["Embarked"].replace({'S': 1, 'C': 2, 'Q': 3})
test = test.replace({'female': 1, 'male': 2})
test["Cabin"] = test["Cabin"].astype('category').cat.codes
test["Embarked"] = test["Embarked"].replace({'S': 1, 'C': 2, 'Q': 3})
